title: Katharine McPhee and her husband David Foster step out for a casual dinner while out in Los Angeles
text:
It's date night for these newlyweds.

Katharine McPhee, 35, and her husband David Foster, 69 stepped out for some dinner at II Pastaio in Beverly Hills on Friday evening.

The two kept it casual while heading into the establishment as she sported a purple ALO yoga set.

Date night: Katharine McPhee and her husband David Foster, 69 stepped out for some dinner at II Pastaio in Beverly Hills on Friday evening

Stylish: The two kept it casual while heading into the establishment as she sported a purple ALO yoga set

The American Idol kept it casual in the purple active-wear and her hair pulled back in a cheetah-print headband.

She carried a small Chanel handbag as she followed behind her much-older husband.

Foster looked dashing in a plain button up and ripped jeans as he hurried ahead of his wife for their date night.

Getaway car: The American Idol kept it casual in the purple active-wear and her hair pulled back in a cheetah-print headband

The two met back when she was still a contestant on American Idol back in 2006.

At that time, she performed the song I Have Nothing which was written by Foster who had helped her rehearse the song before the big performance.

The two grew so close that he was a wedding guest at her first wedding in which she married Nick Cokas back in 2008. She filed for divorce years later in 2014.

Expensive taste: She carried a small Chanel handbag as she followed behind her much-older husband

And then dating rumors began to heat up in May of 2017 after they were spotted dining out at Nobu in Malibu.

'I'm really, really fond of him, and I think he's an incredible person,' she said during her interview with Health for their December 2017 issue. 'I've known him since I was 21 years old, you know? He produced my first single. So he's been really good to me. People can say whatever they want.'

And in July of 2018 it became official when he proposed to his longtime love in July last year.

The two later made things official in London over the summer during a small intimate ceremony. Making this his fifth marriage and Katherine's second.
